mapper.insert: insert into notice ( ouid, board_number, title, notice_type, ispopup, create_user, create_date, modify_user, modify_date, expiration_date, use_flag ) values ( #{ouid}, #{board_number}, #{title}, #{notice_type}, #{ispopup}, #{create_user}, sysdate, #{modify_user}, sysdate, #{expiration_date}, '1' )
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, notice_type = #{notice_type}, ispopup = #{ispopup}, expiration_date = #{expiration_date}, modify_user = #{modify_user}, modify_date = sysdate where ouid = #{ouid}
mapper.delete: update notice set use_flag = '0' where ouid = #{ouid}
mapper.select: select ouid, to_char(board_number) as board_number, title, notice_type, ispopup, expiration_date, to_char(expiration_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as str_expiration_date, create_user, create_date, to_char(create_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as str_create_date, modify_user, modify_date, to_char(modify_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') as str_modify_date, use_flag from notice where use_flag = '1' order by expiration_date desc, notice_type desc
select * from notice_contents where notice_uid = #{notice_uid} order by seq asc
select * from notice where use_flag = '1' and ispopup = '1' and expiration_date > sysdate order by notice_type desc, expiration_date desc
select 'NOTICE' || LPAD((select nvl(max(board_number), 0) + 1 from notice), 8, '0') as ouid, (select nvl(max(board_number), 0) + 1 from notice) as board_number from dual
